name: Cat Herder (dancar)
description:
Guide the cats to the goal by strategically placing fish, cheese etc.

Click on fish, cheese and radios to select them and move them around the level to guide the cats into the goal.

Cats - Likes rats, birds and fish. Will run away from radios.

Rats - Likes cheese and fish. Will run away from cats and radios.

Birds - Doesn't care about anything

Controls:

Mouse Left click: Select and move fish, cheese or radio
Mouse Hover: Hover over stuff to see how they affect the animals
R: Restart current level
M: Toggle sound on/off
ESC: Return to start menu
